name: PicoDoku
description:
The most complete sudoku game made in pico-8!

Gameplay Controls

Arrow Keys - Move your cursor around

Z & X - Increment and decrement the number in your currently selected cell

Note-Taking Controls

E & D - Cycle through your different note-taking zones

S & F - Move through your different note-taking cells

Q & W - Increment and decrement the number in your currently selected note-taking cell
